clients.title: Add a Branding Campaign with Google Ads
description: We highly recommend utilizing Google Ads to start a branding campaign. With branding campaigns, you control your message and namespace and increase your visibility on the search engine results page. These campaigns typically only cost a few hundred dollars each month (depending on your firm name) and certainly benefit your firm, especially when coupled with a regular Google Ads campaign.

With our limited-time offer of $500 in Google Ads Credit when you sign up for Justia Amplify PPC Management, now is the perfect time to get started! It really is that easy to take your marketing to the next level.

jld.title: Compare & Save Feature In The Justia Lawyer Directory
description: Prospective clients can now compare and save attorney profiles while browsing the Justia Lawyer Directory. Be sure to make your directory profile as complete as possible by including your credentials, a high quality photo, peer & client reviews, payment options, contact information, and more, as prospective clients will use these new features to compare attorneys side-by-side.
